text: was that they were able to obtain some respectable clothing, with which they wore a white tie and Red Flag badge, thus presenting a much better appearance. Later on many a sunny Sunday evening, when George went to speak at Malin Bridge, they would be there to begin the meeting.
handwritten_text: was that they were able to obtain some respectable clothing, with which they wore a white tie and Red Flag badge, thus presenting a much better appearance. Later on many a sunny Sunday evening, when George went to speak at Malin Bridge, they would be there to begin the meeting.
